languages.text:
Меркатум Табула Официале открыла Джай Хейдари море возможностей. Покинув Миссию Касбаллики, она стала самостоятельным игроком. Выбор своей судьбы — уникальный дар, о котором не смеют мечтать обычные смертные, но всегда мечтала Джай. Она завела новых друзей, умело прошлась по грани между торговлей и пиратством, отбирала у сильных и даровала милость слабым, даже купила несколько скромных планет — и никогда, никогда не изменяла себе.
Спустя полвека ее жизнь трагически оборвалась — слабая и малонеизвестная династия Вольных Торговцев, возглавляемая молодой и амбициозной предводительницей, подстерегла и пленила Джай Хейдари, чтобы присвоить ее богатства. Удар флота фон Валанциус был молниеносен, но спасти госпожу Хейдари не удалось — она погибла в руках своих алчных захватчиков.

The Mercatum Tabula Officiale unlocked a sea of possibilities for Jae Heydari. She left the Kasballica Mission and became an independent agent. Choosing one's destiny is a unique gift that ordinary mortals would never dare dream of, but Jae was no ordinary mortal. She found new friends, skilfully danced along the knife's edge between trade and piracy, stole from the strong, granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and she never, ever betrayed herself.
Half a century later, her life was tragically cut short — a weak and little-known Rogue Trader dynasty, led by a young and ambitious leader, ambushed and captured Jae Heydari in order to appropriate her wealth. The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.
languages.original_text:

Выбор своей судьбы — уникальный дар, о котором не смеют мечтать обычные смертные, но всегда мечтала Джай. traits.locale_text:
The Mercatum Tabula Officiale unlocked a sea of possibilities for Jae Heydari. She left the Kasballica Mission and became an independent agent. Choosing one's destiny is a unique gift that ordinary mortals would never dare dream of, but Jae was no ordinary mortal. She found new friends, skilfully danced along the knife's edge between trade and piracy, stole from the strong, granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and she never, ever betrayed herself.
Half a century later, her life was tragically cut short — a weak and little-known Rogue Trader dynasty, led by a young and ambitious leader, ambushed and captured Jae Heydari in order to appropriate her wealth. The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.

Mercatum Tabula Officiale opened an ocean of possibilities for Jae Heydari. Leaving Kasballica Mission, she became an independent player. The choice of your own destiny is a unique gift, that simple mortals never dare to dream of. But Jae always wished for it. She found new friends, skilfully threaded on the edge between trade and piracy, took from the strong and granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and never, never betrayed herself.
Half a century later one fledgeling Rogue Trader, whose name is forgotten, brutally destroyed Jae, accusing her of abuse of power. The Rogue Trader conquered her worlds and wiped out her people, and used everything in her power to burn Jae's name and blasphemous deeds out of the memory of the Expanse.

The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.

languages.text:
帝国官方行商执照为婕伊·海达利带来了无限可能。她离开了卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团，成为了一名独立商人，从此足以自由选择自己的命运。这是一份极其不同寻常的礼物，普通人做梦都不敢想象，但这正是婕伊一直以来的期望。她结交了新朋友，在贸易和劫掠间游刃有余。她从强者那里偷窃财富，对弱者施以仁慈，甚至还买了两颗不小的行星。尽管她做了这么多事情，但她从没有背叛过自己的初心。
然而，半个世纪过后，她却悲剧性地死在了袭击者的手中。那些人来自某个弱小、鲜为人知的行商浪人王朝。在某位雄心勃勃的年轻领袖的领导下，他们袭击了婕伊·海达利，将她捉为俘虏，渴望侵吞她的财富。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝舰队以闪电般的速度发起了攻击，但却未能救回海达利女士，她沦为了贪婪的牺牲品。
languages.original_text:
The Mercatum Tabula Officiale unlocked a sea of possibilities for Jae Heydari. She left the Kasballica Mission and became an independent agent. Choosing one's destiny is a unique gift that ordinary mortals would never dare dream of, but Jae was no ordinary mortal. She found new friends, skilfully danced along the knife's edge between trade and piracy, stole from the strong, granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and she never, ever betrayed herself.
Half a century later, her life was tragically cut short — a weak and little-known Rogue Trader dynasty, led by a young and ambitious leader, ambushed and captured Jae Heydari in order to appropriate her wealth. The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.

traits.locale_text:
帝国官方行商执照为婕伊·海达利开启了无限可能。她离开了卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团，成为了一名独立商人，从此足以自由选择自己的命运。这是一份极其不同寻常的礼物，普通人做梦都不敢想象，但这正是婕伊一直以来的期望。她结交了新朋友，在贸易和劫掠间游刃有余。她从强者那里偷窃财富，对弱者施以仁慈，甚至还买了两颗不小的行星。尽管她做了这么多事情，但她从没有背叛过自己的初心。
然而，半个世纪之后，一位名讳现已被遗忘的新任行商浪人残忍消灭了婕伊的势力，指控她滥用权力。那位行商浪人征服了她的世界，屠杀了她的人民，动用了一切力量将婕伊的名字与她的行径从科罗努斯扩区的记忆中抹去。

languages.text:
Die Mercatum Tabula Officiale eröffnete Jae Heydari einen Ozean an Möglichkeiten. Sie verließ die Kasballica-Mission und machte sich selbständig. Sein eigenes Schicksal wählen zu können, ist ein einzigartiges Geschenk, von dem gewöhnliche Sterbliche nie zu träumen wagen würden. Doch Jae war keine gewöhnliche Sterbliche. Sie fand neue Freunde, tanzte meisterhaft auf der Schneide zwischen Handel und Piraterie, bestahl die Starken, gewährte den Schwachen Gnade und kaufte sogar ein paar bescheidene kleine Planeten — und nie, wirklich nie verriet sie sich selbst.
Ein halbes Jahrhundert später wurde ihr Leben auf tragische Weise viel zu früh beendet. Eine schwache und wenig bekannte Freihändlerdynastie mit einem jungen und ehrgeizigen Anführer lockte Jae Heydari in einen Hinterhalt und verschleppte sie, um sich ihren Reichtum anzueignen. Die Valancius-Flotte reagierte zwar blitzschnell, konnte Herrin Heydari jedoch nicht retten. Sie starb in den Händen ihrer gierigen Entführer.
languages.original_text:
The Mercatum Tabula Officiale unlocked a sea of possibilities for Jae Heydari. She left the Kasballica Mission and became an independent agent. Choosing one's destiny is a unique gift that ordinary mortals would never dare dream of, but Jae was no ordinary mortal. She found new friends, skilfully danced along the knife's edge between trade and piracy, stole from the strong, granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and she never, ever betrayed herself.
Half a century later, her life was tragically cut short — a weak and little-known Rogue Trader dynasty, led by a young and ambitious leader, ambushed and captured Jae Heydari in order to appropriate her wealth. The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.

traits.locale_text:
Die Mercatum Tabula Officiale eröffnete Jae Heydari einen Ozean an Möglichkeiten. Sie verließ die Kasballica-Mission und machte sich selbständig. Sein eigenes Schicksal wählen zu können, ist ein einzigartiges Geschenk, von dem einfache Sterbliche nie zu träumen wagen würden. Aber Jae hatte sich das immer gewünscht. Sie fand neue Freunde, tanzte meisterhaft auf der Schneide zwischen Handel und Piraterie, bestahl die Starken, gewährte den Schwachen Gnade und kaufte sogar ein paar bescheidene kleine Planeten — und nie, wirklich nie verriet sie sich selbst.
Ein halbes Jahrhundert später tauchte eine junge Freihändlerin auf, dereen Name inzwischen längst vergessen ist, und vernichtete Jae brutal, weil sie in ihren Augen ihre Macht missbrauchte. Die Freihändlerin eroberte ihre Welten, löschte ihre Leute aus und nutzte ihre gesamte Macht, um Jaes Namen und vulgäre Taten aus dem Gedächtnis der Ausdehnung auszulöschen.

languages.text:
La Mercatum Tabula Officiale ouvrit un océan de possibilités à Jae Heydari, qui quitta la mission de la Kasballica et se mit à opérer de façon indépendante. Forger son propre destin est un luxe rare dont les simples mortels osent à peine rêver, mais Jae le désirait depuis toujours. Elle se fit de nouveaux amis, dansa habilement sur le fil du rasoir qui séparait le commerce de la piraterie, vola les puissants, épargna les faibles et acheta même quelques modestes planètes, sans jamais trahir ses principes.
Un demi-siècle plus tard, sa vie fut tragiquement écourtée... une dynastie de libres-marchands d'ampleur modeste menée par un chef aussi jeune qu'ambitieux, tendit une embuscade à Jae Heydari et la captura pour s'emparer de sa fortune. La flotte von Valancius ne tarda pas à frapper, mais trop tard pour la sauver... Elle venait de succomber aux mains de ses kidnappeurs.
languages.original_text:
The Mercatum Tabula Officiale unlocked a sea of possibilities for Jae Heydari. She left the Kasballica Mission and became an independent agent. Choosing one's destiny is a unique gift that ordinary mortals would never dare dream of, but Jae was no ordinary mortal. She found new friends, skilfully danced along the knife's edge between trade and piracy, stole from the strong, granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and she never, ever betrayed herself.
Half a century later, her life was tragically cut short — a weak and little-known Rogue Trader dynasty, led by a young and ambitious leader, ambushed and captured Jae Heydari in order to appropriate her wealth. The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.

traits.locale_text:
La Mercatum Tabula Officiale ouvrit un océan de possibilités à Jae Heydari, qui quitta la mission de la Kasballica et se mit à opérer indépendamment. Forger son propre destin est un luxe rare dont les simples mortels osent à peine rêver, mais Jae le désirait depuis toujours. Elle se fit de nouveaux amis, dansa habilement sur le fil du rasoir qui séparait le commerce de la piraterie, vola les puissants, épargna les faibles et acheta même quelques modestes planètes, sans jamais trahir ses principes.
Un demi-siècle plus tard, une libre-marchande novice dont le nom est tombé dans l'oubli écrasa brutalement Jae, sous prétexte qu'elle abusait de son pouvoir. La libre-marchande conquit ses mondes, massacra ses proches et fit tout ce qui était en son pouvoir pour effacer le nom de Jae et ses actes vulgaires de la mémoire des Étendues.

languages.text:
La Mercatum Tabula Officiale abrió un sinfín de posibilidades a Jae Heydari, que abandonó la misión Kasballica para convertirse en agente independiente. Elegir tu propio destino es un don único con el que los meros mortales no se atreven ni a soñar, pero Jae no era una mera mortal. Encontró nuevos amigos, recorrió la fina línea que separaba el comercio de la piratería, robó a los fuertes, fue piadosa con los débiles e incluso compró un par de planetas modestos, y todo sin traicionarse nunca a sí misma.
Medio siglo más tarde, su vida llegó a un abrupto final: una dinastía débil y casi desconocida de Comerciantes Independientes con un líder joven y ambicioso emboscó y capturó a Jae Heydari para apropiarse de su riqueza. El contraataque de la flota von Valancius fue inmediato, pero resultó imposible salvar a la señora Heydari, que murió a manos de sus codiciosos captores.
languages.original_text:
The Mercatum Tabula Officiale unlocked a sea of possibilities for Jae Heydari. She left the Kasballica Mission and became an independent agent. Choosing one's destiny is a unique gift that ordinary mortals would never dare dream of, but Jae was no ordinary mortal. She found new friends, skilfully danced along the knife's edge between trade and piracy, stole from the strong, granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and she never, ever betrayed herself.
Half a century later, her life was tragically cut short — a weak and little-known Rogue Trader dynasty, led by a young and ambitious leader, ambushed and captured Jae Heydari in order to appropriate her wealth. The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.

traits.locale_text:
La Mercatum Tabula Officiale abrió un sinfín de posibilidades a Jae Heydari, que abandonó la misión Kasballica para convertirse en agente independiente. Elegir tu propio destino es un don único con el que los meros mortales no se atreven ni a soñar, pero Jae siempre lo había anhelado. Encontró nuevos amigos, recorrió la fina línea que separaba el comercio de la piratería, robó a los fuertes, fue piadosa con los débiles e incluso compró un par de planetas modestos, y todo sin traicionarse nunca a sí misma.
Medio siglo más tarde, un Comerciante Independiente recién llegado cuyo nombre se ha olvidado, la acusó de abuso de autoridad y la destruyó sin clemencia. El Comerciante Independiente conquistó sus mundos, exterminó a su gente y empleó todos sus recursos para asegurar que el nombre y los obscenos actos de Jae desaparecieran de los registros de la Extensión.

languages.text:
メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルは、ジェイ・ヘイダリの可能性の海を解き放った。彼女はカスバリカ聖務団を離れ、独立したエージェントとなった。自分の運命を自分で選択することは、普通の人間には夢にも思わないような特別な才能だ。だが、ジェイは普通の人間ではなかった。彼女は新しい友人を見つけ、貿易と海賊行為の狭間を巧みに行き来し、強者からは盗み、弱者には慈悲を与え、ささやかな惑星をいくつか購入した。そして、彼女は決して自分を裏切らなかった。
半世紀後、彼女の生命は悲劇的に断ち切られた。若く野心的な指導者に率いられた自由開拓者の王朝が、彼女の富を奪い取るために奇襲を仕掛け、ジェイ・ヘイダリを捕らえたのだ。フォン・ヴァランシウスの艦隊は電光石火の速さで行動を起こしたものの、ヘイダリ女史を救うことは叶わなかった。彼女は強欲な捕獲者の手によって命を奪われたのだ。
languages.original_text:
The Mercatum Tabula Officiale unlocked a sea of possibilities for Jae Heydari. She left the Kasballica Mission and became an independent agent. Choosing one's destiny is a unique gift that ordinary mortals would never dare dream of, but Jae was no ordinary mortal. She found new friends, skilfully danced along the knife's edge between trade and piracy, stole from the strong, granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and she never, ever betrayed herself.
Half a century later, her life was tragically cut short — a weak and little-known Rogue Trader dynasty, led by a young and ambitious leader, ambushed and captured Jae Heydari in order to appropriate her wealth. The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.

traits.locale_text: メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルは、ジェイ・ヘイダリに無限の可能性を開いた。カスバリカ聖務団を離れ、彼女は独立した。自分の運命を自分で選択することは、普通の人間には夢にも思わないことだ。しかし、ジェイは常にそれを望んでいた。新しい友人を見つけ、貿易と海賊行為の狭間を巧みに行き来し、強者からは盗み、弱者には慈悲を与え、ささやかな惑星をいくつか購入した。彼女は決して自分を裏切らなかった。半世紀後、名前はもはや忘れ去られた駆け出しのローグトレーダーが、ジェイの力の乱用を非難し、残忍にもジェイを潰した。ローグトレーダーは彼女の世界を征服し、彼女の人々を駆除し、ジェイの名前と下品な行いをエクスパンスの記憶から消し去るためにあらゆる力を使った。

languages.text:
Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari'ye sonsuz olanaklar sundu. Jae, Kasballica Misyonu'ndan ayrılıp bağımsız oldu. Kendi kaderini seçebilmek; sıradan ölümlülerin hayal edemeyeceği, eşsiz bir armağandır. Jae ise sıradan bir ölümlü değildi. Yeni dostlar edindi, ticaret ve korsanlık arasındaki o ince çizgide yürüdü, güçlülerden çaldı, zayıflara merhamet gösterdi ve hatta birkaç mütevazı gezegen satın aldı. Kendisine asla ama asla ihanet etmedi.
Yarım yüzyıl sonra hayatı trajik bir şekilde, erkenden sona erdi. Genç ve hırslı bir liderin yönettiği, zayıf ve fazla bilinmeyen bir Hür Tacir hanedanlığı, varlıklarına el koymak için Jae Heydari'yi pusuya düşürüp ele geçirdi. Von Valancius filosu yıldırım hızıyla saldırıya geçse de Üstat Heydari kurtarılamadı. Onu esir alan açgözlülerin elinde can verdi.
languages.original_text:
The Mercatum Tabula Officiale unlocked a sea of possibilities for Jae Heydari. She left the Kasballica Mission and became an independent agent. Choosing one's destiny is a unique gift that ordinary mortals would never dare dream of, but Jae was no ordinary mortal. She found new friends, skilfully danced along the knife's edge between trade and piracy, stole from the strong, granted mercy to the weak, and even bought a couple of modest planets — and she never, ever betrayed herself.
Half a century later, her life was tragically cut short — a weak and little-known Rogue Trader dynasty, led by a young and ambitious leader, ambushed and captured Jae Heydari in order to appropriate her wealth. The von Valancius fleet's strike was lightning-fast, but Mistress Heydari could not be saved — she died in the hands of her avaricious captors.

traits.locale_text:
Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari'ye sonsuz olanaklar sundu. Jae, Kasballica Misyonu'ndan ayrıldı ve bağımsız hâle geldi. Kendi kaderini seçebilmek, sıradan ölümlüler için hayali bile kurulamayacak, eşsiz bir armağandır ancak Jae sıradan bir ölümlü değildi. Yeni dostlar edindi, ticaret ve korsanlık arasındaki o ince çizgide yürüdü, güçlü olanlardan çaldı, zayıf olanlara merhamet gösterdi ve hatta bir iki mütevazı gezegen bile satın aldı. Ve kendisine asla ama asla ihanet etmedi.
Yarım yüzyıl sonra hayatı trajik bir şekilde, erkenden sona erdi. Genç ve hırslı bir lider tarafından yönetilen, zayıf ve fazla bilinmeyen bir Hür Tacir hanedanlığı, varlıklarına el koymak için Jae Heydari'yi pusuya düşürdü ve ele geçirdi. Von Valancius filosu yıldırım hızıyla saldırıya geçti ancak Üstat Heydari kurtarılamadı. Onu esir alan açgözlü kişilerin elinde can verdi.
